utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Let me ask you, why is everybody using these tiny lights nowadays? I remember when people used to use big lights.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That’s a good story, Grandpa.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hey

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow, Monica’s letting other people help decorate her tree! Did someone get her drunk again or?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Having a perfectly decorated tree is not what Christmas is about. It’s about being with the people that you love.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That is nice and we’re done. TADA!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I dunno what it is, it just doesn’t quite feel like Christmas to me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, here.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: See now it feels like Christmas!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: … and that’s the story of the dreidle. Now, some people trace the Christmas tree back to the Egyptians, who used to bring green palm branches into their huts on the shortest day of the year, symbolising life’s triumph over death. And that was like 4000 years ago.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So, pretty much around the same time that you started telling this story.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey you guys.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey Joe what’s up?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I had to get out of the apartment. Janine is like stretching all over the place. Y’know, everywhere I look she’s like…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can see why that’s hard to resist.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I like her so much!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Aw, I’m sorry sweetie that she doesn’t feel the same way.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know. And she’s so sweet. I just wanna feed her grapes and brush her hair.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You are aware that she’s not a monkey, right?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I am so over Janine. I mean, yeah, at first I thought she was hot, but now she’s like OLD NEWS!

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Hey guys!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi Janine!

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: I just got a call to be a dancer on a television special for New Year’s Eve. It’s called some sort of Dick’n Rock’n Dickie Eve.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hold it! Are you talking about Dick Clark’s New Year’s Rocking Eve?

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Yeah, that’s what I said.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! We love that show! I mean Ross and I have been watching it since I can remember!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ah, you’re still just a little fat girl inside aren’t you?

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Well I’m gonna be on it this year. I’m gonna be one of the party people.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You’re gonna be a party person! Those guys rock the most!

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Well they said I should bring someone. Do you wanna be my dance partner?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Totally! I would love to spend New Year’s with you.

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Well actually they’re taping tomorrow. I don’t really understand why.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, well you see how it works is, the part with Dick Clark in Times Square is actually live, but they tape some of the party stuff ahead of time. Yeah, not a lot of people know that.

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Yeah well, do you guys wanna come too?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Are you serious?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We are there!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What, what are you laughing at?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I used to date him, but you’re still going out with her!

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Thanks. Great so we can all go together! I gotta run. Catch you later!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Bye!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Bye Janine!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Did she just ask me out on a date?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don’t think so.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you talking about? She just invited him to the biggest party of the millennium!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, but she also invited you and Ross. Yeah, honey, I’m sorry, but I don’t think that was a romantic thing.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh. Maybe. But hey I know how I can find out. We’re going to a New Year’s Eve party, right? So at midnight, I can kiss her. And if she kisses me back, great! Y’know? But if she says ‘Dude, what the hell are you doing?’ I can say ‘It wasn’t me, it was New Years!’

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, that’s a lot better than Ross trying to kiss me in High School, and saying that he did it because he needed chapstick.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It was a dry day.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We are going to Dick Clark’s New Year’s Rocking Eve!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: OK, listen I’ve been on sets before, so let me give you a little advice, alright? It’s a show, but we’re just dancing, OK? It’s no big deal. The important thing to remember – stay cool.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Got it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God it’s just like I dreamed it!

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: OK, everyone gather up.

utterance.speaker: Monica and Ross
utterance.content: ‘Scuse us

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: Here’s what’s gonna happen. The music’s gonna start, you’re gonna dance, we’re gonna tape, you don’t look at the camera. Any questions?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, I have a question. When is this gonna air?

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: Uh, yeah. Now you guys dance over there, you guys over there, and I want you two right around here, and everyone else spread out.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ross! So when is it gonna air?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, you look in the kitchen, I will look in the back closet.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can save you time ladies, I’m right here.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, Chandler why don’t you take a walk? This doesn’t concern you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: We are looking for our Christmas presents from Monica.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What? That’s terrible!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No-no, we do it every year!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh well, that makes it not terrible.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, yeah, we never find them! She’s always best at us that wily minx.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Don’t worry, we’re just gonna search here for an hour, them we’re gonna go over to Joey’s and search, OK?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No not okay, you can’t look for Monica’s presents!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But we have to!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, you don’t have to, and you can’t because I live here too.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well then, you should look with us.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Chandler, aren’t you worried about what to get Monica for Christmas?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, I have a great idea for a present for her.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, that’s it? A great idea!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Chandler, that’s not enough. I mean what if she gets you a great present, two medium presents, and a bunch of little presents? And you’ve just gotten her one great present? I mean that’s just gonna make her feel bad. Why would you do that to her Chandler? Why? Why?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: If I help, we can find ‘em faster!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That’s right!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh ooh, we have a live one!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, it’s a Macy’s bag!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh, who’s it for?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Dear losers, do you really think I’d hide presents under the couch? P.S. Chandler, I knew they’d break you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-oh. She may be onto us.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: We are so gonna find them this year.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y’know when you guys said you were gonna go across the hall and look, you don’t, you don’t do that every year do you?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You don’t, like go into the back of my closet, and look under my gym bag or anything?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe and Rachel
utterance.content: No, we never do that

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Because that’s where Joey gave me some stuff to store that I’ve never seen before in my life! Okay, that did not just happen!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, here comes another camera.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Right. No biggie. Stay loose.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why do they keep doing that?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: If we wanna get on camera, I think we have to get up on one of those platforms. They’ve been taping those people up there all day.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Right.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, what’d you guys do to get up on there?

utterance.speaker: Girl
utterance.content: We learned how to dance.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh yeah? Well when you learned how to dance did you forget how to put on underpants?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Hey! You’re a good dancer!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Yeah, well you’d be better if you just loosened your hips a little.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What do you mean?

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Like this.

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: That’s it, feel the rhythm. That’s better.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: Okay, you’re dancing with that girl over there.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no-no-no-no we came together!

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: I don’t see it. You are dancing with the tall guy over there. Tall guy, raise your hand!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no hey buddy, please let me dance with that girl, I really like her and I think I have a shot.

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: Really, y’think so? I don’t..

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I couldn't find anything at Joey--Hey-hey, oh hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, we found them. There were in the guest room closet behind some coats.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, and you have nothing to worry about 'cos they're all crap!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Those are my gifts, I got them for you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohhh. Thanks Chandler they're great!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well Chandler, what is this very weird, metal A Z thing?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Those are book ends! That's a great gift!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, okay, I'm sorry, thank you for my azzz.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ha!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Make sure you put all that stuff back in the closet, okay?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes, okay, oh, by the way, I just gotta say, I think it's really nice of you that even after you've moved, you still keep storing that stuff for Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey-hey dancer girl! Can I go to the bathroom? I just.. Here we go. Looking good Gellers!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We know!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, see that snippy guy over there? He’s the one who decides who gets up on the platform. We should go dance by him.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: Okay, everybody hold!

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: Next on the platforms are… …you two! And… …You two!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Excuse me, sir, would it help if I weren’t wearing underpants?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Monica! Would it?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Tall guy! Hey, listen, I wanted to talk to you about that girl that you’re dancing with.

utterance.speaker: Tall Guy
utterance.content: She’s nice, huh? To think I almost brought my wife to this!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah, okay. Uh, look buddy, I came with that girl, and I had this plan to kiss her at the new years countdown – I’m trying to win her over, so I was wondering if..

utterance.speaker: Tall Guy
utterance.content: No I don’t think so.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh come on man, you can dance with my partner, she’s real, uh, mellow!

utterance.speaker: Tall Guy
utterance.content: Look, are you dating this girl you came with?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I was hoping after tonight that maybe I could you know…

utterance.speaker: Tall Guy
utterance.content: No, no. She’s fair game if you ask me, sorry buddy!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Alright, alright, hey y’know fair is fair, if you’re right, you’re right, what can I say, but hey oh no!

utterance.speaker: Tall Guy
utterance.content: God! What are you, in second grade?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, now you’re the one who wet his pants.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Man, this sucks! Y’know if Mom and Dad don’t see us on TV after we made them so jealous, I mean, who’s gonna be the losers then?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, I know what’ll get us up on a platform!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: The routine!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ross, we haven’t done the routine since middle school.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, when the snippy guy sees the routine, he’ll wanna build us our own platform!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Was it really that good?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We got honourable mention in the brother/sister dance category! Look, it’s almost fake midnight, do we really have any other choice?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, let’s do it. Mom and Dad are gonna be so faced!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, do we really have to ask who’s going up on the platform next?

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: Oh no! You get up there and do that again exactly like that!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: Make sure you get this, they’re gonna want it for the bloopers show. Alright cut! Listen up everyone, when we start again it’s gonna be the countdown to new years, so I wanna see everybody’s excitement.

utterance.speaker: Tall Guy
utterance.content: Hey, pal, you have about three seconds to get away from my partner.

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: What’s going on over here?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, take a look at the guy’s pants! I mean, I know you told us to show excitement, but don’t you think he went a little overboard?

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: What’s the matter with you? Get out of here!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, take a hike wetpants!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Can you believe this? We’re gonna be on the platform for the Millennium moment!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know! Hey, you haven’t been practising the routine, have you?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Me too!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, when the music starts up again, I was thinking of maybe goind into the robot, y’know?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ross, I think we should stick to the routine, we don’t wanna look stupid!

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: Alright we’re back! Ten seconds left here we go! Ten! Nine! Eight! Seven!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Three, Two, One!

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: Cut!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! Year! Happy No Year!

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: Okay, here’s where we go to the live shot of Times Square, nice work everyone that’s a wrap!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey! Look who I found!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, hey guys!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Y’know, birds have a very good sense of direction, and I thought maybe they could help us find where the presents are hidden.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, if the presents are hidden south for the winter.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Or we could just follow your clever jokes – any ideas? No! Didn’t think so! Okay, c’mon guys, show us where the presents are!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, the duck seems to think that Monica got me garbage! Hmm, I wonder what I could get Monica that’s as good as garbage?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hmm, how about my azzz?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, this is hollow.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: This bench, it’s hollow! I can’t believe I never knew that! Oh, the presents!!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, don’t look directly at them!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Alright, no, we could look at them!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, this one’s for me!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, this one’s for Chandler. Here.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh great!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And the big one’s for me!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ooh, let’s open them!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay! Okay! Okay!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hee hee!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wait, we can’t do this.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe and Rachel
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don’t wanna know what Monica got me. Y’know? I mean, look, I’m sure she worked really hard at getting you a present, and wanting to surprise me, and you guys are gonna ruin that, and I, look we have to put these back, this is not what Christmas is about.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Whatever Linus, I’m opening mine.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Nobody is opening anything ok? Look, I don’t know about you guys, but I wanna see the look on Monica’s face when I give her my present, and I’m sure she wants to see the look on my face when I get mine. So please, please, can we just, can we put them back?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Will you get us better gifts?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Fine!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey guys! You found the presents? Chandler, you let them find the presents? Great! Do you know how long it took me to find you that water purifier?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That’s what you got me?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh yes, I see what you mean. That look is priceless.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Home sweet home, huh? Nice to, uh, get back to reality. Plus we know how the New Year’s gonna go off. I guess there’s no reason for all that Y2K panic, y’know? Anyway, g’night!

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: 3, 2, 1. Happy New Year.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, yoii. What was that for?

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Well, I don’t know tonight when they yelled cut and we didn’t get to kiss, I was really, really, disappointed, and I just, really wanted to kiss you

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really? In the moment, I really wanted to kiss you too. In the moment.

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: In the moment, yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But only in the moment. So do ya wanna kiss again?

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Sure, New Year’s Eve is only two weeks away. Can you wait?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Me neither.

utterance.speaker: Janine
utterance.content: Joey, you don’t have to count down every time we kiss.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, yeah, okay. Except I sorta felt like I needed a couple of seconds to get ready.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We were on the platform, ready to dance the world into the new Millennium, and the guy yelled ‘CUT!’

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh, wait, so you guys are telling me you actually did the routine from eighth grade?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah. But of course we had to update it a little bit. Hey, by the way, great thinking about catching me!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: ‘Cos I was gonna say there’s no way you could’ve done the end the way you guys did it back then!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What? We could do it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don’t know, I mean you were a lot bigger, I mean, stronger back then.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can do it, okay? Come on, let’s go.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can’t do it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Now you do that, you’re on TV.
